entity.name: Condition_assessment
entity.description: The cumulative result of evaluating all the criteria involved in a condition, in the context of a subject target. The result is derived from evaluating all the individual logical expressions of a compound criteria.

explicit.name: assertion
explicit.description: The recorded value of the result of assessment.

entity.name: Criterion_evaluation
entity.description: The evaluation record of each criterion element invovled in a condition.

explicit.name: criterion_evaluated
explicit.description: The criterion that is being evaluated.

explicit.name: result
explicit.description: The recorded value of the result of evaluation of a criterion.

explicit.name: value_record
explicit.description: The recorded value of a parameter that is evaluated. The parameter value can be recorded in a format through using the Parameter associated to the criterion as a template.

entity.name: Evaluated_item_identification
entity.description:
A recording of the object being evaluated. The object is identified by its host entity name and the identifier vlaue. There could be multiple instances of entities required to identify a single object, such as a product version.
The object must be within scope of a context associated by a Condition_assignment. The context assignment also serves as a reference path for locating an object subject to evaluation.

explicit.name: evaluation
explicit.description: The evaluation excuted with respect to the item.

explicit.name: host_entity
explicit.description: The entity name within a schema of ISO 10303, to which the subject of evaluation belongs.

explicit.name: item_identifier
explicit.description: The identifier of the obejct evaluated.
